content: Yan Yan | Personal Webpage Yan Yan Associate Professor Department of Computer Science University of Illinois Chicago office: LIB3-190G email: yyan55 [AT] uic.edu News: [Top] In Fall 2026 and Spring 2027, I have multiple openings for postdocs and Ph.D students in the fileds of computer vision, biomedical image analysis, multimedia and machine learning. Feel free to contact me with your CV. Bio Dr. Yan Yan is currently a tenured Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Illinois Chicago. He received his Ph.D. in Computer Science at the University of Trento. He has published 200+ research papers in the fields of computer vision, multimedia and machine learning. He received IBM Best Student Paper Award in ICPR 2014, Best Paper Award in ACM Multimedia 2015 and Best Paper Finalist in ACM Multimedia 2018. He has served as the General Chair for ACM ICMR 2025 and as Area Chairs for major computer vision and multimedia conferences including CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, BMVC, ACM Multimedia, ICLR and NeurIPS. He also served as associate editors in Neurocomputing, Computer Vision and Image Understanding (CVIU), Machine Vision and Applications (MVA), Image and Vision Computing (IVC), and guest editors in IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI), Computer Vision and Image Understanding (CVIU) and ACM Transactions on Multimedia Computing, Communications, and Applications (TOMM).
